ur_rna.Utilities

Class ExtensibleException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • ur_rna.Utilities.ExtensibleException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GuiItemNotFoundException, ScriptRuntimeException

    public class ExtensibleException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Exception that allows additional details to be added.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        If a new message has been stored (using setMessage) this will return the new message. Otherwise, the result is the same as calling Throwable.getMessage()
        Overrides:
        getMessage in class java.lang.Throwable

      • getOriginalMessage

        public java.lang.String getOriginalMessage()
        This returns the original message passed in the constructor (to Throwable). This will only differ from getMessage if setMessage has been used to store an updated message.

      • putData

        public ExtensibleException putData(java.lang.String key,

      • resetMessage

        public void resetMessage()
        If a new message has been stored (using setMessage) this will revert the message back to the original (passed in the constructor.)

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(java.lang.String value)
        Allows the calling code to update the message stored in this exception.
        Parameters:
        value - The new message.
